enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve normalizing whitespace in strings, making them complementary for setting up test cases.
The method is used to determine if a character is whitespace, which is crucial for the normalization process in appendNormalisedWhitespace.
The method checks if a string is blank, which can be used to validate the output of appendNormalisedWhitespace after normalization.
The method joins a collection of strings, which can be used to compare the normalized output with expected formats.
